member.summary: The StringValue displayed in the TextField

member.summary: The value to be used to pre-select an item from the list

member.name: P:MatBlazor.BaseMatAutocomplete`1.ValueChanged
member.summary: ValueChanged is fired when the value is selected(by clicking on an element in the popup)

member.name: P:MatBlazor.BaseMatAutocomplete`1.ItemTemplate
member.summary: ItemTemplate is used to render the elements in the popup if no template is given then the string value of the objects is displayed..

member.name: P:MatBlazor.BaseMatAutocomplete`1.CustomStringSelector
member.summary: This function is used to select the string part from the item, used both for filtering and displaying if no ItemTemplate is defined.

member.name: P:MatBlazor.BaseMatAutocomplete`1.Collection
member.summary: The collection which should be rendered and filtered

member.name: P:MatBlazor.BaseMatAutocomplete`1.Outlined
member.summary: If this parameter is true then the style of the textbox is outlined see `MatTextfield`

member.name: P:MatBlazor.BaseMatAutocomplete`1.OnOpenedChanged
member.summary: OnOpenedChanged is fired when the popup dialog is opened or close and the parameter indicates whenever is it open, the default value is false

member.name: P:MatBlazor.BaseMatAutocomplete`1.OnTextChanged
member.summary: OnTextChanged is fired when the string value is changed(when an input occurs in the textfield or when an item is selected)

member.name: P:MatBlazor.BaseMatAutocomplete`1.ShowClearButton
member.summary: This value indicates if the clear button(using a trailing icon) should be displayed, which can clear the entire text and the selected value), the default value is false

member.name: P:MatBlazor.BaseMatAutocomplete`1.FullWidth
member.summary: This value indicates if the textfield and the dialog will be or not displayed in the full screen, the default value is false

member.summary: Represents an instance of a Toast It handles the user interactions and orchestrates the the state transitions

member.name: T:MatBlazor.BaseMatToast
member.summary: Toasts provide brief notifications or messages about app processes

member.name: T:MatBlazor.Services.Toast.CommonOptions
member.summary: The common options for MatToaster

member.name: P:MatBlazor.Services.Toast.CommonOptions.ToastClass
member.summary: The main toast class. Defaults to

member.name: P:MatBlazor.Services.Toast.CommonOptions.MaximumOpacity
member.summary: The maximum opacity expressed as an integer percentage for a toast in the Visible state. Defaults to 80% where 0 means completely hidden and 100 means solid color.

member.name: P:MatBlazor.Services.Toast.CommonOptions.ShowTransitionDuration
member.summary: How long the showing transition takes to bring a toast to the MaximumOpacity and set it to the Visible state. Defaults to 500 ms.

member.name: P:MatBlazor.Services.Toast.CommonOptions.ShowStepDuration
member.summary: Interval between component repaint during the showing trantition. Defaults to 100 ms.

member.name: P:MatBlazor.Services.Toast.CommonOptions.VisibleStateDuration
member.summary: How long the toast remain visible without user interaction. Defaults to 5000 ms.

member.name: P:MatBlazor.Services.Toast.CommonOptions.HideTransitionDuration
member.summary: How long the hiding transition takes to make a toast disappear. Defaults to 500 ms.

member.name: P:MatBlazor.Services.Toast.CommonOptions.HideStepDuration
member.summary: Interval between component repaint during the hiding trantition. Defaults to 100 ms.

member.name: P:MatBlazor.Services.Toast.CommonOptions.ShowProgressBar
member.summary: States if a progressbar has to be shown during the toast Visible state. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:MatBlazor.Services.Toast.CommonOptions.ProgressBarStepDuration
member.summary: Interval between component repaint during the Visible state: it's used only if ShowProgressBar is true. Defaults to 50 ms.

member.name: P:MatBlazor.Services.Toast.CommonOptions.ShowCloseButton
member.summary: States if the close button has to be used for hiding a toast. The button presence disables the default "hide on click" behaviour. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:MatBlazor.Services.Toast.CommonOptions.CloseIcon
member.summary: The css class for the close icon. Defaults to .

member.name: P:MatBlazor.Services.Toast.CommonOptions.RequireInteraction
member.summary: When true it disables the auto hiding and forces the user to interact with the toast for closing it. Defaults to false.

member.name: T:MatBlazor.Services.Toast.Configuration
member.summary: Represents the global instance

member.name: P:MatBlazor.Services.Toast.Configuration.NewestOnTop
member.summary: Drives the toast display sequence: when true the newest displayable toast will be on top. Otherwise it will be on the bottom. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:MatBlazor.Services.Toast.Configuration.PreventDuplicates
member.summary: When true, a new toast with the same type, title and message of an already present toast will be ignored. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:MatBlazor.Services.Toast.Configuration.MaxDisplayedToasts
member.summary: The maximum number of toasts to be displayed at the same time. Defaults to 5

member.name: P:MatBlazor.Services.Toast.Configuration.PositionClass
member.summary: The css class driving the toast position in the screen. The predefined positions are contained in . Defaults to

member.name: P:MatBlazor.Services.Toast.Options.Onclick
member.summary: The async to be called on user click

member.name: P:MatBlazor.Services.Toast.Options.Type
member.summary: The

member.summary: The css class representing the toast state
